alert.note: Alert for Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson Davis, southwestern Acadia and northwestern Vermilion Parishes through 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Arthur to near Thornwell. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Welsh, Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Mermentau, Morse, Riceville and Thornwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
